labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

labels.name: wontfix

issues.title: Remove Auth and AuthPSK modes
issues.author: bifurcation
issues.body: HPKE has four modes: Base, PSK, Auth, and AuthPSK.  Auth and AuthPSK are supported by DHKEM, but no other known KEM.  And there is no known application usage of them.  So we should remove them from this updated spec.

issues.title: Apply Errata on RFC 9180
issues.author: bifurcation
issues.body:
RFC 9180 has had several errata filed on it:

https://www.rfc-editor.org/errata_search.php?rfc=9180&rec_status=15&presentation=table

They should be addressed in this new document.

issues.title: Add support for non-two-stage KDFs
issues.author: bifurcation
issues.body: The KDF interface in HPKE requires discrete Extract and Expand operations.  More modern, sponge-based KDFs such as SHAKE do not have these discrete steps.  We should define a new, alternative KDF interface that can be used by KDFs of this form.

issues.title: Define PQ ciphersuites
issues.author: bifurcation
issues.body:
HPKE needs to have ciphersuites that are resistant to attack by a quantum computer.  We should define a set of PQ ciphersuites that address common use cases:

* [ ] Hybrid: DHKEM(X25519) + ML-KEM-768
* [ ] Hybrid: DHKEM(P-256) + ML-KEM-768
* [ ] Hybrid: DHKEM(P-384) + ML-KEM-1024
* [ ] Pre PQ: ML-KEM-768
* [ ] Pre PQ: ML-KEM-1024

issues.title: IANA registry takeover
issues.author: martinthomson
issues.body: We can make this an IETF registry
